description: Try our easy to follow Smashed Chickpea & Feta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smashed Chickpea & Feta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420 g can chickpeas no added salt

recipeInstructions.text: Place cucumber, tomato, onion, feta, basil leaves, asparagus and chickpeas in a large bowl. Whisk oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a jug. Drizzle over salad and stir to combine. Tear toasted bread into pieces and serve with salad.
